about_the_game:
SUMMARY
Play as Oberohm or Altania as they battle through the labyrinth of the moon. Use items from your environment and enemies as weapons to fight back against the monsters that blight the surreal landscapes within. Explore and discover the secrets of the moon, unlock your hidden powers with the help of friends, and craft powerful abilities as you break through the cycle that keeps the lovers apart.


STORY
Two worlds, nearly decimated by a catastrophe of light and darkness. Two lovers, separated by a moon that appeared without warning. Now apart, Oberohm and Altania must do all that they can to find each other once more. For while the moon hangs in the sky, time itself seems to separate them. And while they remain apart, the fate of both worlds hangs in the balance.

“So long as I can see the moon, I know that you also are searching for me.”
— Oberohm

GAMEPLAY
Lovers in the Lunar Labyrinth is a 2.5D Rogue-lite action platformer wherein the player must race against time to find their way through the surreal and labyrinthine landscape of the moon, before time runs out and the process begins again. With help of allies gathered from across the universe, players must use whatever is at their disposal to fight enemies, and to seek out their lost powers to advance deeper into the moon’s labyrinth.


FEATURES

Control - Wield the elements in the fury of battle as weapons against your enemies. Equip anything, from dust, to bones, to a drop of rain, and harness their properties to full effect as a melee or ranged attack, or infuse its power with your own to grant your attacks some of their benefits.

Construct - Create and wield skills with powers gained from collected items using the Sagecraft system, a system by which they can hone their powers to create and augment their combat abilities. Use anything, from rocks, to leaves, to bones, to a drop of rain, as the core of your skill, utilizing their properties in your own named and crafted abilities.

Combine - Mix the properties of various items and objects to devastating effect. Make a sword hit with the weight of a boulder, or water slice as sharp as a sword, as you mix and combine object properties to craft your ultimate weapon against the monsters you face.

Consume - Become what you eat! “Eat” items you find to grow more powerful! Consume items to boost your powers as you explore the moon, and digest them fully to permanently improve yourself as you delve deeper and deeper into the Lunar Labyrinth.
